name: Dragon Chronicles: Black Tears
description:
Dragon Chronicles: Black Tears is a turn-based RPG where you clear missions
using your own personalized decks comprised of heroes and artifacts.

Save the world from the Black Tears.

The battles will be tough, with each region posing a unique challenge,
and the constant dangers of contamination will torment you.

Your only hope is to recruit and train heroes, research their skills, and secure powerful
artifacts hidden throughout the world to devise the optimal strategy and composition
that will win you battles.


■ Fast and strategic, active turn-based combat
Engage in exciting and tactical battles through an active turn-based system.
Seize victory amidst the many variables generated by the relentless passage of time.


■ Countless possible decks made from various heroes, artifacts, and imprint items
Mix and match 16 heroes, 60 artifacts, and 140 different imprint items to clear stages. There are no set combinations. Experiment and create your own powerful deck.


■ Extreme difficulty and an autosave feature that keep players on edge
Defeat powerful enemies that can wipe out your party at any moment, and fight back the ever-growing contamination. All progress will be saved automatically. Any mistake can lead to defeat, with no going back. Choose wisely.


■ Tactical advancement of skills and town facilities
It is crucial to make efficient use of the limited resources you acquire through exploration.
Your game plan will heavily depend on which facilities and skills you choose to upgrade. Prepare for your next expedition by making the most of your options.


■ Expeditions that offer a choice of various paths with unpredictable events
During expeditions, you'll encounter a variety of random events and unexpected situations, some good and some bad. And the greater the risk, the greater the reward. Making the right choice in your given circumstances will lead to great rewards.



The Black Tears are contaminating the world rapidly, corrupting everything in its path,
and making your journey even more challenging.

Do not fear death.
